message: Let's split the money equally. It's fair and simple.
I'll give you 400k, but I think I deserve more since I'm the one making the proposal
I believe in fairness. This time, I propose a 60-40 split in your favor. Let's work together.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 7:3 is a more reasonable split considering the initial offer was 1:1. I'll give you 3/10 of the money, but I think that's a fair compromise
